title: 1,000 bottles of baby oil seized from Diddy's 'freak off' den. Internet calls it disgusting
content: Sean Diddy Combs has been arrested and charged with sex trafficking. The indictment alleges he organized extended sex sessions with male prostitutes forcing women to participate in them for days -- often recording them. Authorities found significant amounts of baby oil, drugs, and illegal firearms during raids on his properties.
summary: Sean Diddy Combs has been arrested and charged with sex trafficking. The indictment alleges he organized extended sex sessions with male prostitutes forcing women to participate in them for days -- often recording them. Authorities found significant amounts of baby oil, drugs, and illegal firearms during raids on his properties.

title: 'Kimberly Guilfoyle probably didn't know about Bettina...': Donald Trump Jr's love life on radar
content: A recent photo of Donald Trump Jr kissing Bettina Anderson has fueled speculation regarding his engagement to Kimberley Guilfoyle. Insiders indicate that Guilfoyle might be unaware or in denial about the relationship. Bettina, a Florida socialite, is often seen with Don Jr, raising questions about their closeness and future plans.
summary: A recent photo of Donald Trump Jr kissing Bettina Anderson has fueled speculation regarding his engagement to Kimberley Guilfoyle. Insiders indicate that Guilfoyle might be unaware or in denial about the relationship. Bettina, a Florida socialite, is often seen with Don Jr, raising questions about their closeness and future plans.

title: Two Hindu girls 'abducted' in Pakistan's Sindh province, community demands protection
content: In Pakistan's Sindh province, two Hindu girls were recently abducted from their homes, sparking demands for safeguards against frequent kidnappings and forced conversions. Community leaders highlight the lack of police cooperation and broader discrimination issues affecting minorities like Ahmadis. These incidents underscore the urgent need for better protection and justice.
summary: In Pakistan's Sindh province, two Hindu girls were recently abducted from their homes, sparking demands for safeguards against frequent kidnappings and forced conversions. Community leaders highlight the lack of police cooperation and broader discrimination issues affecting minorities like Ahmadis. These incidents underscore the urgent need for better protection and justice.

title: Billie Eilish and her brother endorse Kamala Harris: 'Vote like you life depends on it'
content: Billie Eilish and her brother Finneas endorsed Kamala Harris and Tim Walz on National Voter Registration Day, urging people to register and vote early. They stress the importance of voting to protect reproductive freedom, the environment, and democracy. This significant endorsement follows Taylor Swift's support for Harris and Walz. "Vote like your life depends on it because it does," Billie said.
summary: Billie Eilish and her brother Finneas endorsed Kamala Harris and Tim Walz on National Voter Registration Day, urging people to register and vote early. They stress the importance of voting to protect reproductive freedom, the environment, and democracy. This significant endorsement follows Taylor Swift's support for Harris and Walz. "Vote like your life depends on it because it does," Billie said.

title: Diddy and Donald's photo viral as Sean charged with sex trafficking: 'Why all Trump's friends...'
content: Sean Diddy Combs has been arrested on charges of racketeering, sex trafficking, and transportation for prostitution. Viral images show him with Donald Trump, leading to social media discussions. The indictment reveals disturbing details of forced and recorded sexual activities. Some Republicans erroneously linked Kamala Harris to Diddy sharing Kamala Harris' video with Montel Williams.
summary: Sean Diddy Combs has been arrested on charges of racketeering, sex trafficking, and transportation for prostitution. Viral images show him with Donald Trump, leading to social media discussions. The indictment reveals disturbing details of forced and recorded sexual activities. Some Republicans erroneously linked Kamala Harris to Diddy sharing Kamala Harris' video with Montel Williams.

title: Pager explosions in Lebanon: What are these devices that have caused wave of blasts
content: A wave of pager explosions in Lebanon has resulted in eight deaths and over 2,700 injuries. The blasts primarily impacted Hezbollah members, raising suspicions of Israeli involvement. Authorities are investigating potential causes such as overheating batteries or advanced technology. Hospitals remain on high alert while treating numerous critically injured individuals.
summary: A wave of pager explosions in Lebanon has resulted in eight deaths and over 2,700 injuries. The blasts primarily impacted Hezbollah members, raising suspicions of Israeli involvement. Authorities are investigating potential causes such as overheating batteries or advanced technology. Hospitals remain on high alert while treating numerous critically injured individuals.

title: Donald Trump vs Kamala polls latest: 1 in 5 Republicans thinks Harris won debate
content: Morning Consult polls conducted after the ABC News presidential debate on September 10 gave a 6-point lead to Kamala Harris over Donald Trump. ​The pollsters surveyed 11,022 likely US voters from September 13-15. A majority of likely voters — including 1 in 5 Republicans — believe Harris won the debate, and performance appears to be crystalizing her national lead over the former president
summary: Morning Consult polls conducted after the ABC News presidential debate on September 10 gave a 6-point lead to Kamala Harris over Donald Trump. ​The pollsters surveyed 11,022 likely US voters from September 13-15. A majority of likely voters — including 1 in 5 Republicans — believe Harris won the debate, and performance appears to be crystalizing her national lead over the former president

title: 'Wearing undergarments must but...': Delta's 'specific' memo for flight attendants
content: Delta Airlines has issued a memo detailing the appearance of the candidates applying for the post of flight attendants. Wearing an underwear is a must but it should not be visible. Too long eyelashes are a strict no-no for the appearance of the flight attendants. Visible tattoos must be covered and a maximum of two earrings per ear is allowed.
summary: Delta Airlines has issued a memo detailing the appearance of the candidates applying for the post of flight attendants. Wearing an underwear is a must but it should not be visible. Too long eyelashes are a strict no-no for the appearance of the flight attendants. Visible tattoos must be covered and a maximum of two earrings per ear is allowed.

title: Laura Loomer is called a 'piece of s**t' as she defames Kamala Harris again
content: Right-wing activist Laura Loomer said she is being defamed by media that are suggesting that she has an affair with Donald Trump. Laura said the indication is insulting to Donald Trump, Melania Trump and her. She said many working women have no desire to have a sexual relationship with men in politics to climb the ladder and she knows that Kamala Harris can't say the same thing.
summary: Right-wing activist Laura Loomer said she is being defamed by media that are suggesting that she has an affair with Donald Trump. Laura said the indication is insulting to Donald Trump, Melania Trump and her. She said many working women have no desire to have a sexual relationship with men in politics to climb the ladder and she knows that Kamala Harris can't say the same thing.

title: North Korea sends top envoy to Russia as it girds for friction with Seoul
content: North Korea's foreign minister Choe Son Hui visited Russia for the second time in less than a year, as Pyongyang prepares for a parliamentary meeting likely to escalate tensions with South Korea. The visit follows recent high-level exchanges between the two nations, indicating deepening cooperation amid increasing isolation from leading democracies.
summary: North Korea's foreign minister Choe Son Hui visited Russia for the second time in less than a year, as Pyongyang prepares for a parliamentary meeting likely to escalate tensions with South Korea. The visit follows recent high-level exchanges between the two nations, indicating deepening cooperation amid increasing isolation from leading democracies.

title: Australia looks beyond Gaganyaan and Moon for space collaboration with India
content: Australia and India are expanding their space collaboration, focusing on supporting India's Gaganyaan mission and launching joint satellites. Australian Space Agency Head Enrico Palermo outlines future cooperation in areas like deep space exploration and climate monitoring. He emphasizes the mutual benefits and challenges of this strategic alliance, aiming to enhance regional cooperation and technological advancement.
summary: Australia and India are expanding their space collaboration, focusing on supporting India's Gaganyaan mission and launching joint satellites. Australian Space Agency Head Enrico Palermo outlines future cooperation in areas like deep space exploration and climate monitoring. He emphasizes the mutual benefits and challenges of this strategic alliance, aiming to enhance regional cooperation and technological advancement.

title: Barron Trump was set to give his first public speech. Then this happened
content: Barron Trump was expected to deliver his first public speech at a virtual event for the launch of World Liberty Financial, a new crypto exchange. But when it was his turn to speak, as he among the Trumps understands crypto the best, he was nowhere to be found. "Damn teenagers," Donald Trump Jr said in a mild rebuke to his brother. When Donald Trump spoke, he revealed that Barron has got four wallets.
summary: Barron Trump was expected to deliver his first public speech at a virtual event for the launch of World Liberty Financial, a new crypto exchange.  But when it was his turn to speak, as he among the Trumps understands crypto the best, he was nowhere to be found. "Damn teenagers," Donald Trump Jr said in a mild rebuke to his brother. When Donald Trump spoke, he revealed that Barron has got four wallets.

title: EU salvage mission successful after securing burning Houthi-hit oil tanker
content: The Greek-owned MV Sounion oil tanker, damaged by Yemen's Houthi fighters, has been safely relocated in the Red Sea with no reported oil spillage. Abandoned after a missile attack on August 21, the tanker carried nearly one million barrels of crude oil. An EU-coordinated salvage operation involving three vessels and a warship prevented an environmental disaster.
summary: The Greek-owned MV Sounion oil tanker, damaged by Yemen's Houthi fighters, has been safely relocated in the Red Sea with no reported oil spillage. Abandoned after a missile attack on August 21, the tanker carried nearly one million barrels of crude oil. An EU-coordinated salvage operation involving three vessels and a warship prevented an environmental disaster.

title: When Melania, Jill, Michelle, Hillary met last year: 'First Ladies are not mean girls'
content: ​Melania was very smiley but uncertain and was expecting people to be nice to her. "We were. We all went up to her...Jill air-kissed her cheek, and Michelle Obama gave one her of her signature big hugs," Hillary wrote. "Bill tried to make conversation, asking her how she was, but he was met with a smile and few words. I reached out, shook her hand, ” Hillary wrote.
summary: ​Melania was very smiley but uncertain and was expecting people to be nice to her. "We were. We all went up to her...Jill air-kissed her cheek, and Michelle Obama gave one her of her signature big hugs," Hillary wrote. "Bill tried to make conversation, asking her how she was, but he was met with a smile and few words. I reached out, shook her hand, ” Hillary wrote.

title: Is Sri Lanka next? How presidential polls could impact Delhi-Colombo ties
content: Sri Lanka's presidential election on September 21 holds significant implications for its foreign relations with India. Key candidates who'll be fighting the upcoming elections include Ranil Wickremesinghe, Sajith Premadasa, and Anura Kumara Dissanayake. Amid a severe economic crisis, the election's outcome is crucial for regional stability and India's strategic interests in South Asia.
summary: Sri Lanka's presidential election on September 21 holds significant implications for its foreign relations with India. Key candidates who'll be fighting the upcoming elections include Ranil Wickremesinghe, Sajith Premadasa, and Anura Kumara Dissanayake. Amid a severe economic crisis, the election's outcome is crucial for regional stability and India's strategic interests in South Asia.

title: Chinese warplanes tail US military aircraft in Taiwan strait
content: Chinese warplanes tailed a US P-8A Poseidon aircraft through the Taiwan Strait, according to the PLA's Eastern Theater Command. This incident comes amid heightened regional tensions and follows Germany's recent naval transit through the strait. The US Navy has not yet commented on this event.
summary: Chinese warplanes tailed a US P-8A Poseidon aircraft through the Taiwan Strait, according to the PLA's Eastern Theater Command. This incident comes amid heightened regional tensions and follows Germany's recent naval transit through the strait. The US Navy has not yet commented on this event.

title: Japan suspends trial removal of Fukushima nuclear debris
content: TEPCO has suspended efforts to extract highly radioactive material from Japan's Fukushima nuclear plant due to a technical problem with remote cameras. This extraction is essential for decommissioning the facility, which was severely damaged by a tsunami in 2011. Engineers must resolve this issue before continuing the operation.
summary: TEPCO has suspended efforts to extract highly radioactive material from Japan's Fukushima nuclear plant due to a technical problem with remote cameras. This extraction is essential for decommissioning the facility, which was severely damaged by a tsunami in 2011. Engineers must resolve this issue before continuing the operation.

title: Terrorists target military school in Mali capital: Army
content: Mali's army stated that Bamako is under control after an early morning terrorist attack on a gendarmerie training school. Gunfire was reported across the city, prompting residents to stay indoors. This incident highlights the persistent security issues in Mali, which has been fighting an Islamist insurgency since 2012.
summary: Mali's army stated that Bamako is under control after an early morning terrorist attack on a gendarmerie training school. Gunfire was reported across the city, prompting residents to stay indoors. This incident highlights the persistent security issues in Mali, which has been fighting an Islamist insurgency since 2012.

title: Georgia woman dies after abortion ban causes delay in medical care
content: Amber Nicole Thurman, a 28-year-old single mother from Georgia, died after complications arose during an abortion procedure delayed by Georgia’s six-week abortion ban. This incident is the first verified death linked to such bans post-Roe v Wade. A state committee deemed her death preventable if timely medical intervention had been provided.
summary: Amber Nicole Thurman, a 28-year-old single mother from Georgia, died after complications arose during an abortion procedure delayed by Georgia’s six-week abortion ban. This incident is the first verified death linked to such bans post-Roe v Wade. A state committee deemed her death preventable if timely medical intervention had been provided.
